column5: Darryl Cronzy's new fish batter. I did a couple of days ago. It has directions for breading, battering and baking. We tried some battered and some breaded and we all liked the breaded more. IMHO they were both good but the breading was good enough that I will use it again.
I generally prefer to make my own, but that's one guy that likes to eat fish, so I may have to try it.
does it come with a guide to cook it for you and a side order of taters and brown beans?
